jobDescription: As a Robotics Research Intern, youll be working first-hand with our fleet of autonomous mobile robots! Youll be experimenting with new features and capabilities for our robots.ResponsibilitiesHelping to build and maintain our fleet of robotsWriting code to make our robots do new and interesting thingsExploring new areas of robotics, artificial intelligence, and software that could benefit Simbe.Required ExperienceCurrently enrolled in an undergraduate or graduate program in robotics, computer science, artificial intelligence or related area.
